Title: Voluntariness and intention
Abstract: © John Hyman 2016. All rights reserved.I am very grateful to the editors of Jurisprudence for proposing this symposium, and to Maria Alvarez, Erasmus Mayr, Dennis Patterson and Assaf Sharon for taking the time and trouble to write about Action, Knowledge, and Will. I have not been able to address every argument they present, and every question they raise, because of the limitations of space, but I have replied to what seem to me their most challenging arguments and questions. I have organised my comments by topic rather than by critic.
